short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to analyze color and font properties of elements on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AIestheticsAnalyzer is a browser extension developed by Spark AI Consulting that enables users to identify any font and pick any color from a web page. When activated, a crosshair tool appears that moves dynamically with the user's cursor. Users can hover over any text element on the page to view the font family, font size, font weight, and other relevant font properties in an info box. Similarly, users can hover over any color on the page to view its RGB and hex values in the same info box. This extension is useful for designers and developers who want to quickly identify font and color inspirations or troubleshoot font-related issues.
